body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good morning! This is Stephen Harris from AquaPlumb Services. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, hello Stephen. My name is Margaret Brown.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Margaret. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit nervous about a problem I have with the customer service I received.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Margaret. We want to make this right. Can I get your account number and the date of the service for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero four two eight six two three one, and the service was on April twenty second.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Margaret. I have that information now. What exactly happened with the customer service that made you feel nervous?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was promised a service at a specified time, and it was delayed without any communication from your team. It really threw off my entire day.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be upsetting, especially when you're not kept in the loop. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. I will personally look into this matter and ensure we improve our communication going forward.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Stephen. Thank you for taking this seriously.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Margaret. Your satisfaction is our top priority. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's everything. I just hope the communication improves.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Understood. We will make every effort to do better. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and thank you for your time, Margaret. Have a great day!
